subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
Insider Trading
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson said in a statement on Saturday that he had no involvement in an insider trading investigation being conducted by the F.B.I., and reiterated that sentiment after his round.
snippet: Phil Mickelson said in a statement on Saturday that he had no involvement in an insider trading investigation being conducted by the F.B.I., and reiterated that sentiment after his round.
